summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank Trust Company detailing the account balance and transactions for the Jeffrey E. Epstein Insurance Trust. It includes information on account balances, debits, credits, and service charges over a specified period.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is identified as the account holder of the insurance trust account detailed in the financial statement.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

keyFacts: The document details the account balance for the Jeffrey E. Epstein Insurance Trust as of March 31, 2015.
The ending balance for the account was $223.85.
There were no overdraft fees or NSF return item fees for the statement period.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or questions regarding the account.
The statement covers transactions from March 1, 2015, to March 31, 2015.
